Keywords: Avengers , Brute , Dark Avengers , Horsemen
Real Name: Robert Reynolds
Special Powers
(+5 POINTS) VOID: When Sentry would be KO'd, you may instead replace him with an Avengers Forever #053b Sentry on click #7. That character gains Immune until your next turn even if lost. Protected: Pulse Wave.
UNSTABLE: When Sentry is targeted by Mind Control, modify his defense -2.
SHARE MY POWER: Perplex, but only to target other friendly characters. When Sentry uses it, choose one for the targeted character to use until your next turn:
*Charge
*Invulnerability.
Figure Errata
Changed (+5 POINTS) VOID

December 11, 2022
tidge
I will forever be looking at 50-point dials that can serve as teammates for "Captain Thanos" (AFFE 065) or Apocalypse Prime (HoX 059b). I consider this dial to be somewhat risky as a Horseman, as Super Strength isn't doing it many favors and a constant streak of (Outwittable) Invulnerability isn't a good look. This is a fine teammate for Captain Thanos, as a +5 point investment for VOID should allow this figure to be used in a somewhat aggressive manner, and if this is the first loss for the team, �\_(ツ)_/� . There exists limited potential for shenanigans via the single click of SHARE MY POWER, as well as UNSTABLE. The value of this starting line otherwise is mostly that it is a points-friendly cost for teamups.
